name: generator-gurt
description: Generate Unified rewardStyle Tools. A Yeoman based generator for our angular projects

scripts.lint: npm run lint:hint && npm run lint:style
scripts.lint:hint: jshint *.js app/ controller/ directive/ factory/ filter/ route/ service/ test/ view/
scripts.lint:style: jscs *.js app/ controller/ directive/ factory/ filter/ route/ service/ test/ view/
